results.definition: an implement with a shaft and barbed point used for catching fish

examples: they played a gig in New Jersey

results.definition: a cluster of hooks (without barbs) that is drawn through a school of fish to hook their bodies; used when fish are not biting
long and light rowing boat; especially for racing
small two-wheeled horse-drawn carriage; with two seats and no hood
tender that is a light ship's boat; often for personal use of captain
